devdoc.details: Factory contract for deploying and managing BuzzMintCollection contracts

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

StringsInsufficientHexLength(uint256,uin.details: The `value` string doesn't fit in the specified `length`.

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the contract with the deployer as the owner

createContract(string,string,string).details: Creates a new BuzzMintCollection contract for a stamp ID

params.name: The name of the NFT collection
params.stampId: The stamp ID (collection ID) from storage
params.symbol: The symbol of the NFT collection

returns._0: The address of the newly created contract

createContractAndMint(string,string,stri.details: Creates a new contract and mints the first NFT in a single transaction

params.dataURI: The URI of the stored data
params.name: The name of the NFT collection (optional)
params.stampId: The stamp ID (collection ID) from storage
params.symbol: The symbol of the NFT collection (optional)

returns._0: The contract address and token ID

getContractAddress(string).details: Gets the contract address for a stamp ID

returns._0: The contract address (address(0) if doesn't exist)

getStampIdOwner(string).details: Gets the owner of a stamp ID

getUserStampIds(address).details: Gets all stamp IDs for a user

returns._0: Array of stamp IDs owned by the user

hasContract(string).details: Checks if a stamp ID has a deployed NFT contract

returns._0: Whether the stamp ID has a deployed contract and the contract address

isReferenceMinted(string,string).details: Checks if a reference has already been minted in a stamp's collection

returns._0: Whether the reference has been minted

mintNFT(string,string,string,string,stri.details: Mints a new NFT for a stamp ID (creates collection if doesn't exist)

params.dataURI: The URI of the stored data
params.name: The name of the NFT collection (optional, used only if creating new)
params.stampId: The stamp ID (collection ID) from storage
params.symbol: The symbol of the NFT collection (optional, used only if creating new)

returns._0: The token ID of the minted NFT

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BuzzMintCollectionFactory
